title: CLDF dataset derived from Aaley and Bodt's "New Kusunda data: A list of 250 concepts" from 2020
citation: Uday Raj Aaley and Timotheus A. Bodt (2020): New Kusunda data: A list of 250 concepts. Computer-Assisted Language Comparison in Practice 3.4 (08/04/2020), URL: https://calc.hypotheses.org/2414.
